alert.note: Alert for Cochran; Hockley; Terry; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 12:23AM CDT until May 25 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cochran County in northwestern Texas... Northwestern Terry County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Hockley County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Yoakum County in northwestern Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1223 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles south of Lehman, or 15 miles north of Plains, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plains and Tokio. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
